list.abs: ' Here it is , sir ,' said I , and gave him the oilskin packet .“这就是，先生。”我说着就把那油布包递给了他。
Sailors wear oilskins in stormy weather ., 水手在暴风雨天气穿着防水服.
the whole crowd gasped in appreciation . they gave me a cable knit sweater and an oilskin jacket , which kept me dry on the wettest days .大家都赞叹地倒抽一口气。他们给了我针织衫和防水夹克，能让我在最潮湿的日子里保持干燥。
' Here it is , sir ,' said I , and gave him the oilskin packet .“这就是，先生。”我说着就把那油布包递给了他。

entry.def: Oilskins are a coat and a pair of trousers made from thick waterproof cotton cloth.

auth_sentence.content: He was last seen leaving the wheelhouse and was wearing yellow oilskins but no life jacket.
